review: Not able to get it to connect to our TV due to a weak signal from our server.
author: Ray Stose

review: This is my second Chromecast which I purchase for my daughter. Gone are the days of attaching 12 foot HDMI cables and interruption of loose or unplugged cord. This little baby help me stream fro my laptop as well as my Iphone . Really functional purchase. Thanks Amazon and Google for providing a great product at a great price.
author: BoonaDragon

review: Love it !i stream videos all the time.Recomend it to all my friends.
author: Richard Renfroe

review: Works perfect with router BUTunfortunately doesn't work at all with Wi-Fi extenders. Definitely 5 stars if it would work with extenders.
author: FER

review: Some problems with ADSL2. Be sure that you have not any issues with Wi-fi settings
author: alisher

review: Did everything it said it would do. That gets five stars in my book.
author: Jared Ellis

review: This thing makes my life a lot easier in a lot of way.  I do a number of online tutorials to keep up with mu studies, and it is so convenient to be able to cast the video on my tv while i do the tutorial on my laptop.  It's also fun for movie nights and things like that.  I highly recommend it!
author: JessL
